TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Peer extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public MustInherit Class Peer Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of Peer), ISerializable
public ref class Peer abstract : IDisposable, IEquatable<System::Net::PeerToPeer::Collaboration::Peer ^>, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 這個類別表示遠端對等電腦。

span.span: This class represents a remote peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象的目的類別是要提供可由共用的通用基底類別定義等衍生類別和。The purpose of the abstract class is to provide a common base class definition that can be shared by derived classes such as and . 它無法直接建構，因為它是抽象。It cannot be directly constructed, since it is abstract. 開發人員應該改用 PeerNearMe 或 PeerContact 子類別。Developers should use the subclasses PeerNearMe or PeerContact instead. 連絡人、 對等、 遠端對等， ， ，和是同義字的詞彙，內容為基礎。Contact, peer, remote peer, , , and are synonymous terms, based on context. 「 呼叫對等 」 與 「 遠端對等 」 的一般意義相同。"Calling peer" and "remote peer" are commonly synonymous. 呼叫端的對等不是指應用程式呼叫指定的方法。Calling peer does not refer to the application calling a given method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個對等會被視為相等，如果它們有相同的端點集合，不論中的值及其屬性。Two peers are considered equal if they have the same endpoint collection, regardless of the values in their properties. 使用案例不包含此類別直接，但是而不是衍生或類別。Usage scenarios do not involve this class directly, but rather the derived or the classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項功能只會公開在類別。This functionality is only exposed on the class. 這項功能不會顯示在任何其他類型的對等，基於安全性考量。This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons. 如果不找到端點的任何物件，則傳回的集合大小為零 (0) 是。If no objects are found for the endpoint, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.

summary.span: 取得本機快取中資料物件的集合。

returns.span: 這個執行個體所指定的對等電腦或端點的 集合。

span.span: The collection for the peer or endpoint specified by this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項功能只會公開在類別。This functionality is only exposed on the class. 這項功能不會顯示在任何其他類型的對等，基於安全性考量。This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons. 如果對等共同作業工作階段未具現化與的，這個方法無法存取本機電腦上的物件。If the peer collaboration session did not instantiate with a of , this method cannot access objects on the local computer. 也是如此的共同作業工作階段中註冊應用程式。The same is true of the applications registered into the collaboration session. 對等物件的集合包含應用程式、 資料物件和顯示狀態資訊的對等或這個執行個體所指定的端點。The collection of peer objects consists of application, data object, and presence information for the peer or endpoint specified by this instance. 如果不找到端點的任何物件，則傳回的集合大小為零 (0) 是。If no objects are found for the endpoint, a collection of size zero (0) is returned. 如果呼叫的對等訂閱此端點時，會自動更新快取。否則必須在呼叫這個方法之前呼叫。If the calling peer is subscribed to this endpoint, the cache is automatically updated; otherwise must be called prior to calling this method. 呼叫端不需要登入，此方法才能成功完成的共同作業基礎結構。The caller is not required to be signed into the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully. 在成功呼叫或其中一個方法必須已完成，呼叫端之前呼叫這個方法，已登入。A successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was signed in previous to calling this method. 注意： 上定義其他的多載類別而不是子類別和。NOTE: Additional overloads are defined on the class instead of the subclasses and .

exception.span: 呼叫端未訂閱端點，或尚未呼叫 。

span.span: The method is unable to complete due to an error in the underlying Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InviteAsyncCancel(object userToken) cil managed

param.name: userToken
param.span: 使用者定義的物件，用於傳遞至 作業的回呼以供識別。

span.span: User defined object to pass to the callback of the operation for identification.

param.span: 此必要參數在進行中的所有非同步邀請作業中必須是唯一的。

span.span: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations in progress.

summary.span: 取消使用 方法傳送的邀請。

span.span: Cancels the invitation that was sent with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法可確保系統會停止等候從 InviteAsync 要求相關聯的對等。Calling this method guarantees the system will cease to wait for a from the peer associated with the InviteAsync request. 多個邀請可能在任何指定時間未完成。Multiple invitations may be outstanding at any given time. 如果呼叫方法時，所識別的非同步作業`userToken`是不在是否存在，會擲回例外狀況。If the method is called when an asynchronous operation identified by the `userToken` is not in existence, an exception is thrown. `userToken`必須提供物件，因為它用來追蹤特定的非同步呼叫。The `userToken` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call. 這個主機應用程式所提供的物件是唯一的每個邀請要求。This host application-supplied object is unique for each invite request. 使用這個方法時，可能仍會引發事件，但已取消上的屬性相關聯物件將會設定為 `true.`When this method is used, the event can still be raised, but the Cancelled property on the associated object will be set to `true.` 呼叫這個方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of .

span.span: The parameter cannot be
An asynchronous invitation is not outstanding.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ SynchronizingObject { System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ value); };

summary.span: 當屬性值設定後，因非同步作業而未引發的所有事件都會有建立該特定 之執行緒上回呼的相關事件處理常式。

span.span: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific .

value.span: 實作 介面的物件，且由這個型別的執行個體在建立事件處理常式的執行緒上，用來同步處理事件處理常式。

span.span: Object that implements the interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設設定值，這個屬性是`null`，表示所有事件處理常式會在系統執行緒集區執行緒上都呼叫。The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread. 此屬性通常這類設定的 UI 項目執行個體。This property is typically set to a UI element such as a instance.

exception.span: 呼叫端物件已經過處置。

span.span: The calling object has been disposed.
